sentences.en: " Do they always bury it as deep as this? "
sentences.cn: “ 他们总是埋得这样深 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: " Yet some men bury their secrets thus, " observed the calm physician.
sentences.cn: “ 然而,有些人就是这样埋葬着自己的秘密的, ” 那安详的医生评论着.

sentences.en: Beetles bury pellets of dung and lay their eggs within them.
sentences.cn: 甲壳虫把粪粒埋起来,然后在里面产卵.

sentences.en: Electric cables are buried beneath the streets.
Good, thought Huck, they will bury it in the old quarry.
sentences.cn: 好吧, 哈克心里想, 他们会把宝箱埋在石坑里.

sentences.en: He was buried in the churchyard of St Mary’s.
sentences.cn: 他被安葬在圣玛丽教堂的墓地里。

sentences.en: His reaction was to withdraw, to bury himself in work.
sentences.cn: 他的反应是抽身而退，埋头于工作。

sentences.en: I bury my face in my hands and heave a sigh.
I was horrified that people would think I was dead and bury me alive.
sentences.cn: 想到人们会认为我死了并把我活埋，我觉得恐惧万分。

sentences.en: It is time to bury our past misunderstandings.
sentences.cn: 是我们捐弃前嫌的时候了。

sentences.en: It's time to bury our differences and be friends again.
sentences.cn: 是我们摒弃分歧重归于好的时候了.

sentences.en: President Mitterrand arrived in Hanoi yesterday to bury old colonial and cold war enmities.
sentences.cn: 密特朗总统昨天到达河内，以期结束长久以来殖民战争和冷战造成的敌意。

sentences.en: She willed herself to bury her past.
sentences.cn: 她努力使自己忘记过去.

sentences.en: The pirates would often bury gold in the cave and then failed to collect it.
sentences.cn: 海盗常把金子埋藏在山洞里,而后来又没能取走.

sentences.en: The story was buried at the back of the paper.
sentences.cn: 这篇报道被掩藏在报纸的最后面。

sentences.en: We used to bury radishes under the soil to keep fresh and dig them up in time of need.
sentences.cn: 我们过去总是把萝卜埋在土里保鲜,随吃随挖.

sentences.en: When we feel anger, we bury the emotion and feel guilty instead.
sentences.cn: 当我们感到愤怒时，压抑这种情绪反而会觉得内疚。

sentences.en: Will the time never come when we may honourably bury the hatchet?
sentences.cn: 难道我们永远不可能有个体面地休战的时候 吗 ?

phrases.phrase: bury one's head in the sand
phrases.tran_cn: 不正视现实；逃避现实；不愿正视困难，实行鸵鸟政策
媾和，言归于好：停止战争；解决争端
